QuestData.Title: Worse Than It Looks
QuestData.Description:
As bad as things are here we're managing to hold on.
Things are actually a lot worse at Beacon Hill. They're closer to the main attack, and will need all the help they can get.
Head there and see if you can help.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Felicia Gladstone at Beacon Hill
QuestData.RewardText: Patrick's a good person. If he trusts you, your help is welcome.
